transArray.content: The hotel environment is very good, the room is clean and tidy and has no smell. Seeing that I had a lot of luggage, the lady at the front desk was very enthusiastic to help (the only drawback is that it would be better if there was a scale in the roomðŸ˜˜)

Dear guest, thank you for choosing Hanting. The hotel brand rooms are not equipped with the scale you mentioned, but the ladies at the front desk have their own scales. If you need it, you can let us know. Our front desk The ladies will lend them to you. The hotel has set up a free laundry room, food delivery robot, free reading area and tea area to provide you with value-for-money services during your trip.
